long_description: Sleek, smooth, and meant for tough training, the men's Marmot Impact Shorts offer lots of coverage and high-performance moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric. Quick-drying, moisture wicking fabric lends a high degree of stretch to the Marmot Impact Shorts for men; mesh panels enhance breathability. Fabric protects skin from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 30. Internal liner briefs wick moisture, dry quickly and offer formfitting support. Dial in the fit with the comfortable drawcord waist. Hand pockets and a zippered rear pocket stash accessories. Marmot Impact shorts enhance visibility with reflective highlights, and feature a relaxed fit with a 9 in. inseam.
short_description: Sleek, smooth, and meant for tough training, the men's Marmot Impact Shorts offer lots of coverage and high-performance moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric.
